post.author: jizaboz
post.body: Anyone else playing this? My SteamID is also Jizaboz if anyone wants to add me to their list. I find it pretty addicting and I just can't afford the 50$ and the system upgrade yet for Quakewars

post.author: Phobos
post.body: I'm enjoying it, but I can't really get into it. I prefer quake wars still overall

post.author: zeh
post.body: I'm playing it like mad. The game is awesome.

post.author: heXum
post.body: I'm playing the hell out of it as well. ET:QW is not getting any love. I think it pales in comparison to the simple fun of TF2.

post.author: ajm113
post.body:
I want to play this game. I want to be Pyro!


I think it's kind of funny that no one can understand him when he is calling for a medic.
